Subject: Vulois and the child. Destiny?
Message-ID: <8m9mis+qa33@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

From: minime_316@...

Vulois finishes absorbing energy. He is in his fluctuating state. He 
sees bots arrive at the scene, and one child attaks the knewly formed 
huge bot into it's original pieces!

"By The Matrix, what is with this child?"

She is blessed by The Matrix, just as you have been, Convix answered.

Will the child factor in my attempts of peace.

Not now, but soon. And it will be a large part. Without the child, 
you will fail.

Than I shall welcome it with open arms. But first, let's chase th4se 
guys away.

Vulois felt himself reach into their minds, and knew everything about 
them. He started short circutring wires, but only certain systems. He 
hoped the others realizedthey can't be killed. Vulois started firing 
his blasters at their chests, controlled, but enough to hurt. This 
needed to finish. He needed to talk to the child.
